channel.title: [Class suggestion] The Artist
channel.description:
I know this class will never be added but it's fun to try :stuck_out_tongue:
**The Artist** - **Neutral wildcard** ![neutral artist2|500x492](upload://3jL4KAXMzwyTCoSeLPq4apkHG3a.png) _Icon drawn by me_
**Passive - Artistic** Despite not being a killer, you have access to the death note tab.
**Night ability 1 - Plagiarism** (4 uses?) Copy someone's Death Note. If your target has no death note for you to steal, you'll receive a message telling you so.
**Night ability 2 - Self advertisement** (unlimited use) If your target is killed tonight, you will replace the killers death note with your own. Works on any death that occurs at night, excluding suicide.
**Day ability 1 - Bribe** (2 uses) Make the selected person target someone of your choosing tonight. Won't work if selected person uses an ability that targets no-one. Also won't work if either target dies that day.
**Goal** Successfully replace 2 death notes. Live to the end.
---
The idea of this class is that it's more or less someone who can draw all game... But I tried making it useful to both BD and Unseen/Cult/Neutral Killers by adding the Plagiarism ability. Your information could benefit any side as you'll find killing classes.
With the alternative win goal you should lean more towards siding with killers in general, sharing info in whispers, potentially making noble more useful.
It'll also be a good claim for scum, as the artist can never truly confirm his class. But since he's neutral you might not know if you wanna risk losing a potential ally.
I'm tired and writing using Mobile, sorry if anything is spelt wrong :stuck_out_tongue:

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Artist
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
maybe add a new (neutral special) class called “The Special: [x] (Neutral Special)” that is customizable, with the different classes (which should all be roughly as good as each other), and you can bye all but the starter with in-game gold
they should all have the same investigative results, short of the specific class, and each one should have a unique wincon
its unique too, so only one person can be playing as their The Special
that way we could have a The Special: Artist for artists like Luxx, but other stuff like that one that’s trying to find all the players’ starting classes (I forget what it’s called)
Wouldnt that be cool?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Artist
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
This class would be very boring to play.

-find killer class randomly, assassin or NK-
-just replace death note two nights in a row-
-you win-

I think luxx would enjoy playing this class; my computer sucks though, so I can’t draw death notes very good at all.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Methnor
item.description:

in Cena voice “Are you sure about that?”

I really wanted to post CM Punk’s pipebomb but edited to be relevant to the community, as a joke, but I didn’t want anyone to get accidentally offended thinking I was serious.

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Artist
item.dc:creator: Luxx
item.description:
Well technically it’s a Neutral Investigative with its Plagiarism ability You can find killing classes by finding out if said person has a death note or not. This will benefit whichever side you decide to side with.

And it can control your night actions, although it’s a limited use.

But for a more useful alternative to this class…

The Author!
Succesfully replace 2 people’s journals when they die, cause chaos and totally fuck up people’s chances of winning by making their journal info totally useless!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
Im just Imagining, at the top if the death note “This death note was brought to you by [x]”, x being whoever drew the note (player name, not character name)
(not a suggestion to add, it would prob. be pretty bad if an artist was revealed, because some people could then find the artist by how they know what kinds of names they will use)
I could see this happening with Luxx, and then everyone in chat going “wow Luxx, your art is so good!” or something to that effect
